text: Dang tamen dakai ziji de liang dai de shihou, faxian tamen de caiwu yi tuihuan tamenle, tamen shuo:“Women de fuqin a! Women hai yaoqiu shenme ne? Zhe shi women de caiwu, yi tuihuan womenle, women yao wei women de juanshu di liang, yao baohu women de didi, women keyi duo di yi tuo liang, na shi rongyi huode de liangshi.”
